subject: Re: Fwd: Triskelion Fulgerites
author: psi_research
full_text:
The concept behind them is useful. The theory behind chaos being the
natural order of the universe is how I am comfortable with random
audio fragments being manipulated and messages delivered in them. Sort
of like why EVP Maker may work, or the Global Consciousness Project
delivering data associated with world emotion may work. For me
triskelion fulgerites would be interesting to study but I wouldn't
have the skills to incorporate them into any electronics gear but may
find them inspiring to study.
